title: Ticket #6518: IPv6 usability improvements
description: In response to a user complaint about setting up an IPv6-based cluster, I tried setting up my own personal Condor with IPv4 disabled. I ran into several problems, some with old open tickets, others completely undocumented. This ticket gathers up the resulting small changes which didn't fit into existing tickets.
